SELECT type, subtype, CASE WHEN status = 1 THEN '사용' WHEN status = 0 THEN '미사용' ELSE NULL END AS status, catetoryid
FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY catetoryid desc ) AS num, b.type, b.subtype, status ,catetoryid FROM catetory b group by type, subtype, status, catetoryid ) AS t WHERE num BETWEEN #{pageStart} AND #{pageStart}+14 group by status, subtype, catetoryid ORDER BY num;
mapper.insert: insert into catetory (type, subtype, status) values (#{type}, #{subtype}, '1')
mapper.select: select type, subtype, catetoryid, status from catetory where catetoryid = #{catetoryid}
